text: (Zara gaur to karo, us waqt tum kaisi sakht galati kar rahey thay) jabke tumhari ek zubaan se dusri zubaan is jhoot ko leti chali jaa rahi thi aur tum apne mooh se woh kuch kahey jaa rahey thay jiske mutaalik tumhein koi ilm na tha. Tum isey ek mamuli baat samajh rahey thay, halanke Allah ke nazdeek yeh badi baat thi
